#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
 
using namespace std;


int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int c;
		int n;
		cin>>n>>c;
		long long int a[n],sum=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			sum+=a[i];
		}
		if(c>=sum)
		cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"No"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
